mapper.select: SELECT a.t_bno, a.t_title, a.t_content, a.t_regdate, b.t_category FROM tcode.t_board as a INNER JOIN tcode.t_category as b ON a.t_cno = b.t_cno WHERE a.t_cno = 1 ORDER BY a.t_regdate DESC
SELECT t_cno, t_category FROM tcode.t_category ORDER BY t_category
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board( t_title, t_content, t_cno ) VALUES( #{t_title}, #{t_content}, #{t_cno} )
